mapper.insert: INSERT INTO payments(request_id, instruction_id, payer_account, payee_account, payer_customer_id, payer_customer_status, currency, amount, purpose, channel, batch_id, priority, risk_score, status, created_at) VALUES(#{requestId}, #{instructionId}, #{payerAccount}, #{payeeAccount}, #{payerCustomerId}, #{payerCustomerStatus}, #{currency}, #{amount}, #{purpose}, #{channel}, #{batchId}, #{priority}, #{riskScore}, #{status}, #{createdAt})
mapper.select: SELECT request_id, instruction_id, payer_account, payee_account, payer_customer_id, payer_customer_status, currency, amount, purpose, channel, batch_id, priority, risk_score, status, created_at FROM payments ORDER BY created_at DESC
